name: Tobu Tobu Girl Deluxe
description:
Tobu Tobu Girl Deluxe is an enhanced version of Tobu Tobu Girl featuring new and improved full color graphics, with full compatibility for the original Game Boy, Game Boy Color and Super Game Boy peripheral for the retail version, which the original version didn't had. A new "Infinity Mode", in which the player need to get as far as possible in a single run without dying.


The retail version which is published by First Press Games GmbH was backed through Kickstarter and came in two regular versions: JP regular version and US/EU regular version.
A third Limited Edition version was available as well.

The retail version contents included:

  • A cardboard box closely resembling a genuine Game Boy color stylized official release (JP or EU/US style)
  • A sky-blue colored plastic cartridge with the game Tobu Tobu Girl Deluxe
  • A 32-page fully colored manual (including manga).
  • A decor sticker set.
  • A double-sided poster.
  • A numbered "bronze-colored" collector's coin with "Cat" motive (Kickstarter backer only).
  • A numbered "silver-colored" collector's coin with "Girl" motive.
alsoFor: Android, Linux, Macintosh, Windows | Combined View
